description:
Neatly tucked away at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac, this spacious four bedroom residence creates the perfect family home, just a short 350m stroll from the beach. Feeling light and bright within, the home's excellently maintained interior shows off an abundance of living space, made up of upper level lounge and dining rooms, and a large rumpus on the lower level. In terms of outdoor space, a screened balcony spans the length of the home at one side, while a sun-drenched yard and sparkling inground pool promise endless family fun and opportunities for entertaining. Adding further appeal is a huge three-car drive-through garage, while in terms of location, it's definitely worth noting that alongside being close to the beach, the property is also an easy walk from Caves Beach Resort and local shops and dining.

- To appreciate this wonderful coastal property with an inspection please call Neil Fry anytime on 0418494183.
- Enviable location nestled within surrounding bushland, just moments' walk from the beach
- Perfect for anyone who loves getting out on the water, whether on the lake or ocean
- Well planned floorplan laid out over two spacious levels, flooded with natural light
- Property enjoys north-easterly aspect, catching plenty of sunshine and cooling ocean breezes
- Living room and dining room open out onto covered, screened deck at side
- Tidy kitchen features electric stovetop, pantry, breakfast bar dining
- Master with walk-in robe and private balcony, and two robed bedrooms on upper level, serviced by bathroom with corner bath and separate WC
- Fourth bedroom on lower level offers private porch
- Also on lower level is rumpus room, laundry and bathroom with shower
- Easy-care block features fenced grassy yard and inground pool screened by lush landscaping
- Large drive-through garage can hold three cars or two cars with workshop space
- Walk to Caves Beach Resort, and local shops and cafes in Caves Beach
- Five minutes' drive to local schools and a wide range of shops and dining in Swansea
